item.title: Magento mobile skin/theme design and development
item.dc:creator: FiveE Technologies
item.description: Latest development at FiveE Tech is design and development of mobile interface. The project started with study of usability practices for mobiles apps and research docs related to interaction of users and mobile devices. It is certainly a more difficult task then doing websites of screen size of 1024 pixel. The top challenge is delivering effective user experience in a much […]
item.content:encoded:
Latest development at FiveE Tech is design and development of mobile interface. The project started with study of usability practices for mobiles apps and research docs related to interaction of users and mobile devices. It is certainly a more difficult task then doing websites of screen size of 1024 pixel. The top challenge is delivering effective user experience in a much limited sized visual space and yet bring in the comport of mobiles.

The development needs some basic tools like emulators and testing tools to do development work from within the comport zone of a desktop machine. So here are few useful links:

  • Download link to Opera Emulator from http://get.geo.opera.com/pub/opera/sdlbream/1210/Opera_Mobile_Emulator_12.1_Windows.exe
  • Simulate mobile browser in desktop using Chrome extension “Ultimate User Agent Switcher”. Get it from https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ultimate-user-agent-switc/ljfpjnehmoiabkefmnjegmpdddgcdnpo?hl=en-US

 

Up coming next: Working with Long press events in Mobile devices
